text:
Congratulations! You have completed this course on named vectors. We hope you found it helpful and informative.

There are many more resources available to help you continue your learning journey with named vectors.

## Documentation

- [Collection definition: named vectors](/developers/weaviate/config-refs/schema/multi-vector.md): References on how to define named vectors in the collection.
- [How-to: manage data](/developers/weaviate/manage-data/index.md): Code examples for *create*, *update* and *delete* operations, including those with named vectors.
- [How-to: search](/developers/weaviate/search/index.md): Code examples for all types of search operations, including those with named vectors.



See you soon! 👋
name: Named_vectors Next_steps
